import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import Navbar from'../components/Navbar';import TicketCard from'../components/TicketCard';import ticketService from'../services/ticketService';import'../styles/Dashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StaffDashboard=()=>{const[tickets,setTickets]=useState([]);const[stats,setStats]=useState({total:0,open:0,inProgress:0,resolved:0});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchTickets();},[]);const fetchTickets=async()=>{try{const response=await ticketService.getTickets({limit:5});setTickets(response.tickets);// Calculate stats
const total=response.tickets.length;const open=response.tickets.filter(t=>t.status==='open').length;const inProgress=response.tickets.filter(t=>t.status==='in-progress').length;const resolved=response.tickets.filter(t=>t.status==='resolved'||t.status==='closed').length;setStats({total,open,inProgress,resolved});}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching tickets:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading dashboard..."})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Staff Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/create-ticket",className:"btn-primary",children:"Create New Ticket"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Total Tickets"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-number",children:stats.total})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Open"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-number",children:stats.open})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"In Progress"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-number",children:stats.inProgress})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Resolved"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-number",children:stats.resolved})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recent-tickets",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Recent Tickets"}),tickets.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["No tickets found. ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/create-ticket",children:"Create your first ticket"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tickets-grid",children:tickets.map(ticket=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TicketCard,{ticket:ticket},ticket._id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"view-all",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/tickets",className:"btn-secondary",children:"View All Tickets"})})]})]})]});};export default StaffDashboard;
